extendedInfo.description: The most beautiful quotes and sayings about fathers on this Father's Day. Find beautiful, heart touching, inspirational, realistic quotes, proverbs, sayings from famous people, words of wisdom, and more... Search for ideas to write and dedicate to your father.Build your own father's day cards using our most meaningful words.Find inspiration for poems, greetings cards...Everything for Dad, the most special person who cares and loves you. He deserves the best words that describe your love and feeling, not only on this day... every single day!Share quotes through the applications installed on your phone (Facebook, Twitter, SMS, email, whatsapp,...)Extras: quotes from iconic and representative people like: Abraham Lincoln, Oprah Winfrey, Oscar Wilde, Victor Hugo, Whitney Houston, and more.Happy Father's Day!tags: father, fathers day, dad, daddy, happy fathers day , dad's day, sayings, beatiful, greatful, motivation, read inspiring and motivational quotes, father care, father love, dad says, grandfather, jun 16, emotions, inspiration, inspirational, poem, letter,
